025    
026    package com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.processor.standard;
027    
028    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.StringUtils;
029    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.processor.ErrorResponseData;
030    
031    import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
032    
033    
034    public class StandardErrorResponseData extends ErrorResponseData {
035      @NonNull private Long tid;
036      @NonNull private String action;
037      @NonNull private String method;
038      
039      public StandardErrorResponseData( Long tid, String action, String method, Throwable exception, boolean debugOn ) {
040        super( exception, debugOn);
041        
042        assert tid != null;
043        assert !StringUtils.isEmpty( action );
044        assert !StringUtils.isEmpty( method );
045    
046        this.tid = tid;
047        this.action = action;
048        this.method = method;
049      }
050      
051      public Long getTid() {
052        return this.tid;
053      }
054    
055      public String getAction() {
056        return this.action;
057      }
058    
059      public String getMethod() {
060        return this.method;
061      }
062    }
